Iron_toxicity,_chronic_non-transfusion-d.text:
10-20 mg/kg PO QD
Start: 10 mg/kg PO QD
Max: 20 mg/kg/day

Hold: Ferritin <300 mcg/L or liver iron <3 mg Fe/g
